title: Best of The Herd: 11/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/04/2019
description:
Colin is not worried about the Patriots despite the 17 point loss to the Ravens and explains why. He says the Packers got punched in the mouth and didn't respond with any kind of toughness. He apologizes for a strong opinion he had last week about the Browns that was totally wrong. He also admits where else he was wrong over the weekend in the NFL. PLus, former NFL QB Michael Vick comes in studio to talk about what Lamar Jackson is doing and what is wrong with Freddie Kitchens in Cleveland.




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
